clarity: I don’t know what I truly want.
I feel like I’m losing control.
Too many thoughts, I can’t decide.
I feel like I’m going in circles.
I fear making the wrong choice.
I want to know what truly matters to me.
relationships: I don’t know how to say no.
I argue a lot with my partner.
I feel guilty when I refuse.
I give too much and receive too little.
I feel alone even among people.
I want to set healthy boundaries.
stress: I feel I must control everything.
I feel caught in a vortex.
confidence: I feel I’m not good enough.
I compare myself too much to others.
I want to be more productive.
I want to feel capable and steady.
balance: I want to regain inner calm.
willpower_perseverance: I want to access willpower every day.
I lose motivation as soon as it gets tough.
It’s hard to keep habits steady for long.
I procrastinate on the important things.
I start intense and then stop.
I want to finish the projects I start.
I swing between discipline and chaos.
I want to bounce back after breaks or failures.
My willpower runs out too fast.
optimal_weight_management: I want to reach a healthier weight.
My weight swings and I can’t stay stable.
I eat chaotically when I’m stressed or tired.
It’s hard for me to control my portions.
I eat fast and only notice later that I overdid it.
I’d like a more relaxed relationship with food.
I’m lacking the energy and desire to move.
I tried many diets but can’t maintain the results.
I want to lose weight without feeling constantly on a diet.
